page.title: 04Council House Renovations.
page.content: In the{Craigie}area of south-west Perth many{council houses}are being {modernised}to make them more comfort- able for the residents. It takes seven to ten weeks to complete each house and in the meantime the occupants live free in{luxury caravans}for up to eight people, but that is really a bit cramped. Larger families are temporar- ily decanted to houses which have already been modernised. Our houses are having new roofs, windows and doors. The kitchens are being enlarged by knocking down a wall, and new units put into kitchens and bathrooms. {Central heating}(choice of gas, solid- fuel or electricity) is being install- ed and the whole house redecorated. Houses near the{quarry}are having {double-glazing}to keep out the sound of blasting.{Everyone is absolutely {delighted with the final results.
